parameters.name: SC_ECI
parameters.description: Earth Centered Inertial (ECI) spacecraft location (x,y,z) in km.

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LAT
parameters.description: Geocentric latitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LON
parameters.description: Geocentric Longitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_R
parameters.description: Distance from center of Earth in km.

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LAT
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Latitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LON
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Longitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LTIME
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic Local Time

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Electron counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: Background electron count estimate.

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: Electron differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in electron differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: Electron total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in electron total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: Average electron energy (eV).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in average electron energy (eV).

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Ion counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: Background ion count estimate.

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: Ion differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in ion differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: Ion total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in ion total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: Average ion energy (eV).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: Estimated uncertainty in ion average energy (eV).

parameters.name: vx
parameters.description: Vx - median filtered and smoothed ion flow in the ram direction

parameters.name: vxrms
parameters.description: ----> Vx root mean square of the RPA fit

parameters.name: vxraw
parameters.description: Vx - original unfiltered Vx flow

parameters.name: vy
parameters.description: Vy - ion flow in the horizontal crosstrack direction

parameters.name: vyrms
parameters.description: ----> standard deviation of the Vy flow

parameters.name: dmhrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of Vy

parameters.name: vz
parameters.description: Vz - ion flow in the vertical crosstrack direction

parameters.name: vzrms
parameters.description: ----> standard deviation of the Vz flow

parameters.name: dmvrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of Vz (delta Vz / averaged Vz)

parameters.name: temp
parameters.description: ion temperature

parameters.name: te
parameters.description: electron temperature

parameters.name: dens
parameters.description: Ni calculated from the RPA

parameters.name: ductdens
parameters.description: Ni from scintillation meter

parameters.name: ductdensrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of SM density

parameters.name: dens0v
parameters.description: Ni measured from the RPA at 0 volts

parameters.name: dmdens
parameters.description: Ni from the IDM

parameters.name: frach
parameters.description: fractional amount of H+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: frache
parameters.description: fractional amount of He+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: fraco
parameters.description: fractional amount of O+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: ebm
parameters.description: electron background monitor - high energy particle currents detected by the RPA

parameters.name: nmbot
parameters.description: number of data points in the Vy - Vz average

parameters.name: scvel
parameters.description: spacecraft velocity

parameters.name: rpaground
parameters.description: potential difference between SSIES instruments and spacecraft ground

parameters.name: pot
parameters.description: potential of the SSIES instruments relative to the plasma ground

parameters.name: bx
parameters.description: north component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: east component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: bz
parameters.description: vertical downward component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: corvelx
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the ram direction

parameters.name: corvely
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the horizontal crosstrack direction

parameters.name: corvelz
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the vertical direction

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Electrons 30eV-30keV:  Electron counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: -----> Background electron count estimate.

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Electron differential energy flux (eV/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron differential energy flux (fractional).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Electron total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron total energy flux integrated over energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: --> Electron average energy (eV).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron average energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Ions 30eV-30keV:  Ion counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: -----> Background ion count estimate.

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Ion differential energy flux (eV/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion differential energy flux (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Ion total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion total energy flux integrated over energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: --> Ion average energy (eV).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion average energy (fractional).

parameters.name: SC_ECI
parameters.description: Earth Centered Inertial (ECI) spacecraft location (x,y,z) in km.

parameters.description: --> Geocentric latitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LON
parameters.description: --> Geocentric Longitude

parameters.name: SC_ECI
parameters.description: Earth Centered Inertial (ECI) spacecraft location (x,y,z) in km.

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LAT
parameters.description: Geocentric latitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LON
parameters.description: Geocentric Longitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_R
parameters.description: Distance from center of Earth in km.

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LAT
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Latitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LON
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Longitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LTIME
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic Local Time

parameters.name: B_SC_OBS_ORIG
parameters.description: Original measured field (x,y,z) in nT in spacecraft frame.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_SC_ORIG
parameters.description: delta-B (Original measured B - Modeled IGRF field) (x,y,z) in nT in spacecraft frame.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_GEO
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT rotated into geocentric spherical (east-north-up) coordinates.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_APX
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT rotated into Modified Apex Coordinates with Reference Height 110 km.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_SC
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT in spacecraft frame.

parameters.name: SC_APEX_LAT
parameters.description: Modified Apex Geomagnetic Latitude (Reference Height 110km)

parameters.name: SC_APEX_LON
parameters.description: Modified Apex Geomagnetic Longitude (Reference Height 110km)

parameters.name: SC_APEX_MLT
parameters.description: Modified Apex Geomagnic Local Time (Reference Height 110km)

parameters.name: AURORAL_REGION
parameters.description: Numerical code for auroral region of spacecraft location (1=Equatorial,2=Auroral,3=Polar)

parameters.name: AURORAL_BOUNDARY_FOM
parameters.description: Figure of Merit for Auroral Boundary Determination

parameters.name: ORBIT_INDEX
parameters.description: Integer representing the orbit of the day, signed by hemisphere (>0 Northern, <0 Southern).

parameters.name: SC_ALONG_GEO
parameters.description: Unit vector in the direction of spacecraft velocity (ram) in geocentric coordintes

parameters.name: SC_ACROSS_GEO
parameters.description: Unit vector across the spacecraft track to the left ( orthogonal to the direction of spacecraft velocity (ram) ) in geocentric coordintes.

parameters.name: vx
parameters.description: Vx - median filtered and smoothed ion flow in the ram direction

parameters.name: vxrms
parameters.description: ----> Vx root mean square of the RPA fit

parameters.name: vxraw
parameters.description: Vx - original unfiltered Vx flow

parameters.name: vy
parameters.description: Vy - ion flow in the horizontal crosstrack direction

parameters.name: vyrms
parameters.description: ----> standard deviation of the Vy flow

parameters.name: dmhrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of Vy

parameters.name: vz
parameters.description: Vz - ion flow in the vertical crosstrack direction

parameters.name: vzrms
parameters.description: ----> standard deviation of the Vz flow

parameters.name: dmvrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of Vz (delta Vz / averaged Vz)

parameters.name: temp
parameters.description: ion temperature

parameters.name: te
parameters.description: electron temperature

parameters.name: dens
parameters.description: Ni calculated from the RPA

parameters.name: ductdens
parameters.description: Ni from scintillation meter

parameters.name: ductdensrough
parameters.description: ----> roughness parameter of SM density

parameters.name: dens0v
parameters.description: Ni measured from the RPA at 0 volts

parameters.name: dmdens
parameters.description: Ni from the IDM

parameters.name: frach
parameters.description: fractional amount of H+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: frache
parameters.description: fractional amount of He+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: fraco
parameters.description: fractional amount of O+ ions in plasma

parameters.name: ebm
parameters.description: electron background monitor - high energy particle currents detected by the RPA

parameters.name: nmbot
parameters.description: number of data points in the Vy - Vz average

parameters.name: scvel
parameters.description: spacecraft velocity

parameters.name: rpaground
parameters.description: potential difference between SSIES instruments and spacecraft ground

parameters.name: pot
parameters.description: potential of the SSIES instruments relative to the plasma ground

parameters.name: bx
parameters.description: north component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: by
parameters.description: east component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: bz
parameters.description: vertical downward component of Earths magnetic field (IGRF)

parameters.name: corvelx
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the ram direction

parameters.name: corvely
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the horizontal crosstrack direction

parameters.name: corvelz
parameters.description: corotation velocity of ionosphere in the vertical direction

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Electrons 30eV-30keV:  Electron counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ELE_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: -----> Background electron count estimate.

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Electron differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron differential energy flux (fractional).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Electron total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ELE_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron total energy flux integrated over energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: --> Electron average energy (eV).

parameters.name: ELE_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in electron average energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_OBS
parameters.description: Ions 30eV-30keV:  Ion counts as observed; no corrections.

parameters.name: ION_COUNTS_BKG
parameters.description: -----> Background ion count estimate.

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Ion differential energy flux (ev/cm2/delta-eV/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_DIFF_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion differential energy flux (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX
parameters.description: --> Ion total energy flux integrated over energy (eV/cm2/ster/s).

parameters.name: ION_TOTAL_ENERGY_FLUX_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion total energy flux integrated over energy (fractional).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY
parameters.description: --> Ion average energy (eV).

parameters.name: ION_AVG_ENERGY_STD
parameters.description: -----> Estimated uncertainty in ion average energy (fractional).

parameters.name: SC_ECI
parameters.description: Earth Centered Inertial (ECI) spacecraft location (x,y,z) in km.

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LAT
parameters.description: --> Geocentric latitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LON
parameters.description: --> Geocentric Longitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_R
parameters.description: --> Distance from center of Earth in km.

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LAT
parameters.description: --> Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Latitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LON
parameters.description: --> Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Longitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LTIME
parameters.description: --> Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic Local Time

parameters.name: SC_ECI
parameters.description: Earth Centered Inertial (ECI) spacecraft location (x,y,z) in km.

parameters.description: Geocentric latitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_LON
parameters.description: Geocentric Longitude

parameters.name: SC_GEOCENTRIC_R

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LAT
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Latitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LON
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic  Longitude

parameters.name: SC_AACGM_LTIME
parameters.description: Altitude Adjusted Corrected Geomagnetic Local Time

parameters.name: B_SC_OBS_ORIG
parameters.description: Original measured field (x,y,z) in nT in spacecraft frame.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_SC_ORIG
parameters.description: delta-B (Original measured B - Modeled IGRF field) (x,y,z) in nT in spacecraft frame.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_GEO
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT rotated into geocentric spherical (east-north-up) coordinates.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_APX
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT rotated into Modified Apex Coordinates with Reference Height 110 km.

parameters.name: DELTA_B_SC
parameters.description: Baseline Corrected delta-B in nT in spacecraft frame.
